title: David Earls
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023063329/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Writers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023063329/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Writers) : David Earls**

David Earls is a web editor and recovering graphic designer based in London, and the author of "Designing Typefaces", a book published by RotoVision.

author: Stephen Coles
